p: The most frequent symptoms in the positive cases of HMPV were cough, fever, dyspnea, attack on the general condition, sudden onset of symptoms, rhinorrhea, irritability, polypnea and headache. The rest of the symptoms presented in a smaller proportion. The most frequent comorbidities in positive cases of HMPV were diabetes, hypertension, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, obesity, asthma, smoking and cardiovascular disease; comorbidities such as immunosuppression, HIV and chronic renal failure occur in a smaller proportion ( Table 4).
